name: SwiftSales – Live Chat, CRM & Analytics
author: SwiftSales

sections.description:
WordPress Chat Plugin

Want to interact with website visitors while they browse it? By integrating SwiftSales, you can engage your clients and respond to their questions when they visit you.
You can also engage customers by sending them personalized messages or making product recommendations in addition to resolving their issues. Additionally, you can add a contact form to your website so that users can send you messages offline or even subscribe to your mailing list.

Chat Plugin with Modified Features

SwiftSales provides AI-based functionality, such as targeted messages or AI-generated messages, to engage customers in live chat or display targeted products while tracking visitors’ purchasing patterns.
Additionally, users can modify the chat widget to create the appearance and feel of the brand while injecting code from your WordPress site onto SwiftSales. Decide on the widget’s shape, the color that best represents your brand, and the positioning that best suits your needs.

SwiftSales for WordPress Website

You may help your potential customers even during odd hours by linking your WordPress website with SwiftSales. Our chatbot tool makes it simple to communicate with customers and respond to their inquiries at the appropriate time.
Incorporating your website with SwiftSales might be quite beneficial if you are willing to offer 24.7 customer care and are having trouble helping every one of your customers to the best of your ability.

Collect Customer Data from WordPress Website

Extracting consumer insights from your WordPress website is simple with SwiftSales. Brands can identify the visitor’s location and gather pertinent data by using the analytics tool.
In contrast, the live screen-sharing feature helps to analyze visitors’ purchasing patterns and brand familiarity. The data on your WordPress website may now be readily extracted to reveal customer insights.

What is SwiftSales for WordPress Integration?

SwiftSales is your tool if you run a professional website and are losing out on potential website traffic.
The plugin is installed using just one piece of code on websites. All you need to do is copy your website’s code and paste it into the code script to install a widget on your WordPress website. In addition to installing the code, you can also start a live chat and view the visitors’ further information.
SwiftSales, in a nutshell, assists companies with WordPress websites in twofold revenue by converting infrequent visitors into paying customers.

Uses: SwiftSales
(Privacy Policy)

Note: SwiftSales is analytics and customer support service developed by SwiftSales
sections.installation:
Automated Installation

  1. Go to your WordPress admin dashboard, then find the Plugins” menu.
  2. Click on “Add New” and search for “SwiftSales”.
  3. Activate the SwiftSales plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  4. Click the SwiftSales menu on the left.
  5. Create a new account from (here) or sign in if you already have a SwiftSales account.
  6. If you see your website press the connect button.

Manual Installation

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/swifsales directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the SwiftSales Menu to go to configuration view of the plugin
  4. Click the SwiftSales menu on the left.
  5. Create a new account from (here) or sign in if you already have a SwiftSales account.
  6. If you see your website press the connect button.
